rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;bdac72a4.1502">   <title>Call for Applications for Editor of Children, Youth and Environments </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;bdac72a4.1502</link>   <description> *Call for Applications for Editor of Children, Youth and Environments*<br><br>The current editors are soliciting candidates for editor (or co-editors) of<br>the journal Children, Youth and Environments. The new editor will assume<br>the position of editor-designate in the summer of 2015 and during the<br>transition will begin working with the current editors Willem van Vliet,<br>Louise Chawla and Fahriye Sancar to become familiar with journal operations<br>and procedures. The editor-designate will assume lead responsibility for<br>the journal beginning in the Spring of 2016, commencing with Volume 26. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-02T15:15:31-07:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Children, Youth and Environments</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;bdac72a4.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;f8cb5949.1501">   <title>Call for Applications for Editor of Children, Youth and Environments </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;f8cb5949.1501</link>   <description> *Call for Applications for Editor of Children, Youth and Environments*<br><br>The current editors are soliciting candidates for editor (or co-editors) of<br>the journal *Children, Youth and Environments*. The new editor will assume<br>the position of editor-designate in the summer of 2015 and during the<br>transition will begin working with the current editors Willem van Vliet,<br>Louise Chawla and Fahriye Sancar to become familiar with journal operations<br>and procedures. The editor-designate will assume lead responsibility for<br>the journal beginning in the Spring of 2016, commencing with Volume 26. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-23T18:55:56-05:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Caitlin Cahill</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;f8cb5949.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;8a832755.1501">   <title>FW: Intersectional Childhoods and Inequalities_ SUII Seminar Series-Briefing and further outputs/resources </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;8a832755.1501</link>   <description> The University of Edinburgh is a charitable body, registered in<br>Scotland, with registration number SC005336.    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-23T12:56:53+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Barry Percy-Smith</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;8a832755.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;66eba49a.1501">   <title>Forthcoming research methods courses from the EPPI-Centre, UCL Institute of Education, University College London </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;66eba49a.1501</link>   <description> Research methods courses from the EPPI-Centre (UCL Institute of Education) will provide you with highly sought-after skills and knowledge, supporting career development in those academic, policy or practice settings where systematic reviews are used and produced.<br><br>1. Systematic reviews for policy and practice \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd a short course in conducting and using reviews [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-22T15:22:36+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Philip Rose</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;66eba49a.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;d236ccb1.1501">   <title>Forthcoming public lecture </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;d236ccb1.1501</link>   <description> [cid:image003.jpg@01D033D5.48130100]<br>University of Huddersfield inspiring tomorrow's professionals.<br>[http://marketing.hud.ac.uk/_HOSTED/EmailSig2014/EmailSigFooter.jpg]<br><br>This transmission is confidential and may be legally privileged. If you receive it in error, please notify us immediately by e-mail and remove it from your system. If the content of this e-mail does not relate to the business of the University of Huddersfield, then we do not endorse it and will accept no liability.    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-19T10:47:13+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Sue Hanson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;d236ccb1.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;cd927bde.1501">   <title>Children, Youth and Environments: new papers just published </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;cd927bde.1501</link>   <description> Children, Youth and Environments has just published a new issue, now available on:<br><br>http://www.jstor.org/action/showPublication?journalCode=chilyoutenvi<br><br>It contains a special section on Greening Early Childhood Education, which continues the 2014(2) special issue on this theme, and additional papers on environmental health, sense of place, and neighborhood perceptions (see below).<br><br>It also includes field reports with lessons from practice and book reviews. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-16T14:22:37-07:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>CYE Readers</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;cd927bde.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;b4b70b79.1501">   <title>FW: The Centre seminar: 26 February, Gavin Redhead, Participation in the Corporate Parenting Agenda - Can a shift in the power relationship really happen? </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;b4b70b79.1501</link>   <description> Dear colleagues<br><br>this seminar on Participation in corporate planning at UcLan may be of interest<br><br>Barry    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-16T14:52:05+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Barry Percy-Smith</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;b4b70b79.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;5a581c19.1412">   <title>Conference Announcement: How To Improve Children's Health </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;5a581c19.1412</link>   <description> How To Improve Children\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds Health: Putting Research Into Practice<br>26 \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd 27 January 2015<br>Cumberland Lodge<br>www.cumberlandlodge.ac.uk/childrenshealth<br><br>Following the publication of the Annual Report of the Chief Medical Officer \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdOur Children Deserve Better: Prevention Pays\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd, I am writing on behalf of Dr Owen Gower, Programme Director at Cumberland Lodge, to invite you to join us for a two day conference to gather the latest thinking on children's health in the UK and focus on recommendations for putting the research into practice. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-09T12:32:59+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Rebecca Sparkes</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;5a581c19.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;dcdfbc.1411">   <title>FW: There is no Them! Child, Youth, Family and Disability 7th & 8th Juy 2015 conference, UWE </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;dcdfbc.1411</link>   <description> Colleagues may be interested in this event<br><br>'THERE IS NO THEM!' CHILD, YOUTH, FAMILY AND DISABILITY CONFERENCE: CALL FOR PAPERS<br><br>Venue: University of the West of England, Blackberry Hill, Fishponds, Bristol, BS16 1DD<br><br>Date: 7th and 8th July, 2015<br><br>Time: 10.00 - 4.00<br><br>http://www.eventbrite.com/e/there-is-no-them-child-youth-family-disability-conference-2015-tickets-14501413117?aff=es2&amp;rank=100<br><br>This year we are delighted to announce that the Child, Youth, Family &amp; Disabiity Conference will again take place at the University of the West of England in Bristol. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-25T09:35:28+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Barry Percy-Smith</dc:creator> rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;8164b2a0.1411">   <title>FW: Seminar: 25 years of the United Nations Convention on the Rights of the Child (UNCRC): The relevance of children\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds rights in a higher education context</title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;8164b2a0.1411</link>   <description> Colleagues may be interested in this event on children\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds rights<br><br>From: ESA Sociology of Children and Childhood RN [mailto:ESACHILDHOOD@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Rachel Rosen<br>Sent: 10 November 2014 08:30<br>To: ESACHILDHOOD@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: Seminar: 25 years of the United Nations Convention on the Rights of the Child (UNCRC): The relevance of children\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds rights in a higher education rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;831f9b4f.1410">   <title>FW: 25 years of the UNCRC: The relevance of children's rights in a higher education context </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;831f9b4f.1410</link>   <description> Colleagues may be interested in this event<br>Apologies for cross posting<br><br>From: ESA Sociology of Children and Childhood RN [mailto:ESACHILDHOOD@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Rachel Rosen<br>Sent: 13 October 2014 10:19<br>To: ESACHILDHOOD@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: 25 years of the UNCRC: The relevance of children's rights in a higher education context<br><br>Could you please post this to the list. Sorry for any cross-postings! [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-13T13:59:24+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Barry Percy-Smith</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;831f9b4f.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;24efdd3b.1410">   <title>Fwd: FW: Greening Early Childhood Education, CYE Journal Vol. 24, No. 2 is now available online </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;24efdd3b.1410</link>   <description> Greening Early Childhood Education is now available online<br><br>Volume 24(2), 2014<br><br>Guest editors<br><br>Patti Bailie, University of Maine Farmington<br><br>Nancy Rosenow, Dimensions Educational Research Foundation<br><br>For article access and subscription information:<br><br>www.jstor.org/page/journal/chilyoutenvi/about.html<br><br>http://www.jstor.org/stable/10.7721/chilyoutenvi.24.issue-2<br><br>This special issue explores outcomes associated with bringing nature into<br>the settings of child care centers, preschools and kindergartens and<br>describes a variety of ways to do this in practice. Seven research articles<br>review the literature on benefits that children gain from engagement with<br>nature, evaluate the impacts of naturalized school grounds and nature<br>kindergartens on children\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds development, and examine education for<br>sustainability in early childhood programs. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-10T14:37:29-06:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Children, Youth and Environments</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;24efdd3b.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;376ae0c6.1409">   <title>FW: SUII Seminar 4 invitation:2nd October 2014: Intersectional childhoods: Practical applications across Practice, Policy and Research: Registration deadline 18th September </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;376ae0c6.1409</link>   <description> The University of Edinburgh is a charitable body, registered in<br>Scotland, with registration number SC005336.    </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-10T17:44:26+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Barry Percy-Smith</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;376ae0c6.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;7c22627e.1404">   <title>NEW EMAIL ADDRESS </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;7c22627e.1404</link>   <description> Hi all<br><br>Just to let you know I will be leaving UWE, Bristol in a couple of weeks and taking up a new post at University of Huddersfield as Professor and Director of the Centre for Applied Childhood Studies.<br><br>My new email address from April 28th will be: B.Percy-Smith@hud.ac.uk&lt;mailto:B.Percy-Smith@hud.ac.uk&gt;<br><br>Regards<br><br>Barry    </description>   <dc:date>2014-04-19T12:07:13+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Barry Percy-Smith</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHILDPARTICIPATIONNETWORK;7c22627e.1404</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
